channel.title: Run.bat issue [317]
channel.description:
compiler..
@echo off title Runeshy pkz java -Xmx500m server pause
error: 'java' is not recognized as an internal... I am running windows 7 64 bit. My jdk location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0 My jre6 location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6 my jre7 location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7 Please help.
